title: F12 Support for web browser and web view controls
body: Currently there are no production tools to debug web browser (.NET) or web view (Store App) applications. It is nightmare to identify JavaScript memory leaks and sometimes hang and crash as well. Ability to troubleshoot them (post mortem analysis) would go long way.

comments.body: @Ken Did you solve the problem of F12Chooser app quitting? I am  trying to attach to an outlook plugin and have the same problem. It shows up in the F12Chooser app but when I select it the F12Chooser app quits.
To be clear, the F12Chooser app quits, not mine.
Running F12Chooser, I can see and select the page that is loaded in my web view, but the app then just quits. Any thoughts?

F12Chooser is nice to have, but it is cumbersome for developers.
I am not sure how does the filter work, isn't it supposed to filter by file name?
